title: Eighteen Months
description: The lights went out just before midnight. Half an hour later, I crossed the road and climbed quietly over her fence. I stood still in her dark garden, taking slow breaths, looking around, listening.  In this chapter of the Dark Teesside series, the events unfold in Thornaby, Redcar and Acklam...  Introducing Eighteen Months, a crime thriller by award winning author Glenn McGoldrick.
author: Glenn McGoldrick
